resources.string:
"B6 Color Green" (position + "color" + the color).
 
 "All Color Red" (if you'd like all tiles to have the same color). 
 
 Or you can even choose one of our redesigned artworks: "mario", "pacman", "heart", "pig", "pikachu", "amongus", "tree", "creeper" and "smiley". 
 To draw Mario for example, just say "Draw mario"
